CustomField.formula: If (Activated_Quantity__c = Contracted_Quantity__c, "Installed" , If (Contracted_Quantity__c = Canceled_Quantity__c, "Canceled", If ( AND (Activated_Quantity__c <> 0, Canceled_Quantity__c = 0, Contracted_Quantity__c > Activated_Quantity__c), "Partially Installed", If (AND (Activated_Quantity__c = 0 , Canceled_Quantity__c = 0), "Not Installed", If ( AND (Activated_Quantity__c = 0, Canceled_Quantity__c <> 0, Contracted_Quantity__c > Canceled_Quantity__c), "Partially Canceled", "Installed/Canceled")))))
CustomField.label: Status
